author: Zeta Ret, Ivo Yankulovski
text: display object container with button functionality applied to children

public_methods.addButtonShape: name: String, nocfg: Boolean, listeners: Boolean, interaction: Boolean, mouseEnabled: Boolean, mouseChildren: Boolean; return Object
public_methods.configButtonShape: btnsh: zetaret.global.packages.clockwork.ui.DisplayObject, listeners: Boolean, interaction: Boolean, mouseEnabled: Boolean, mouseChildren: Boolean; return zetaret.global.packages.clockwork.ui::ButtonContainer

protected_methods.drag: target: zetaret.global.packages.clockwork.ui.DisplayObject, dx: Boolean, dtarget: zetaret.global.packages.clockwork.ui.DisplayObject, handler: Function, hscope: Object; return zetaret.global.packages.clockwork.controllers::DragController

ButtonContainerStatis.this: statis invoker of the ButtonContainer constructor

descriptions.addButtonShapeCls: default ProtoSS class used in addButtonShape method to create button children

ButtonContainer.this: ProtoSS model extending both ChildContainer and Button, works with ChildController/MouseController/DragController/InteractionController super types

ButtonContainerStatis.this: statis invoker, called once by protoss superize mechanics, static flags of the statis embed only allowed methods in the final compilation
